front.title: IEEE Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks: Overview and Architecture - Amendment 2: Registration of Object Identifiers
front.abstract: IEEE Std 802-2001, IEEE Local and Metropolitan Area Networks: Overview and Architecture, provides an overview to the family of IEEE 802 standards. This amendment to IEEE Std 802-2001 specifies an Object Identifier hierarchy used within IEEE 802 for uniform allocation of Object Identifiers used in IEEE 802 standards.
